concept.title: Tracking Across Different Implementation Types
concept.shortdesc: This information is intended for advanced users who are well-versed in both reporting and implementation. Do not attempt to edit your implementation without understanding the consequences. If you require implementation changes, contact your organization's Account Manager.

conbody.p: If you use more than one type of implementation (such as JavaScript and hardcoded image requests), ensure that the following variables are specified and match each other:
If each of these do not match across implementations, users may be tracked as separate visitors.
